Address.label: Address
Address.value: 104 SOUTH MICHIGAN AVENUE,SUITE 900, CHICAGO, Illinois, 60603, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Coeur Mining Inc is a metals producer focused on mining precious minerals in the Americas. It is involved in the discovery and mining of gold and silver and generates the vast majority of revenue from the sale of these precious metals. The operating mines of the company are palmarejo, Rochester, Wharf, and Kensington. Its projects are located in the United States, Canada and Mexico, and North America.

value.name: Michael Routledge
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
